document_data.name: Temple Hill
document_data.mainbody: '''Temple Hill''' was the westernmost of the four hills in [[Chult]] atop which [[Port Nyanzaru]] was built. It was located on the northern side of the [[Port Nyanzaru/Merchants' Ward|Merchants' Ward]].
document_data.Description: The top of Temple Hill was dominated by the [[Temple of Savras (Port Nyanzaru)|Temple of Savras]], which was also the hill's namesake. The hill was quite steep, and the upper area was completely walled-off from the lower ground, making it generally an exclusive area for the city's wealthy.
